title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Annie Hall
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
description: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.

title: Saturday Night Fever
description: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

title: Eraserhead
description: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

title: Suspiria
description: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

title: Julia
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The story of the playwright Lillian Hellman's relationship with her friend, Julia, who asks her to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.

title: The Goodbye Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.

title: A Bridge Too Far
description: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

title: Slap Shot
description: A failing ice hockey team finds success using constant fighting and violence during games.

title: Smokey and the Bandit
description: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over county lines in hot pursuit by a cheeky sheriff.

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
description: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

title: The Hills Have Eyes
description: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.

title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
description: A collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne.

title: The Rescuers
description: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

title: Sorcerer
description: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across the dangerous South American jungle.

title: 3 Women
description: A shy, awkward woman works at a spa in the California desert and becomes roommates with a confident, talkative co-worker, but their relationship takes a strange turn.

title: Opening Night
description: An actress is haunted by the accidental death of a fan and begins to confront the chaos of her own life.

title: The Turning Point
description: When her daughter joins a ballet company, a former dancer is forced to confront her long-ago decision to leave the limelight for a family life.

title: High Anxiety
description: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia goes to work for a state mental institution run by doctors who appear to be more crazy than their patients.

title: The Duellists
description: Two officers in Napoleon's army violently confront each other in a series of duels that last for decades.

title: Cross of Iron
description: A German commander places his ambition for the Iron Cross above the lives of his squad as they retreat from the Russian front.

title: That Obscure Object of Desire
description: Recounted in flashbacks to a group of travelers on a train, an aging Frenchman falls in love with a young Spanish woman who toys with his affections.

title: The American Friend
description: An expatriate American criminal convinces a German picture framer, who believes he is dying of a blood disease, to become an assassin.

title: Soldier of Orange
description: When the Germans invade the Netherlands in 1940, several friends in a student orchestra choose different paths; some join the resistance, some collaborate, and others try to remain neutral.

title: Stroszek
description: A street musician, his prostitute girlfriend, and his elderly neighbor leave Berlin for the promise of a better life in Wisconsin.

title: Pumping Iron
description: A documentary about the 1975 Mr. Olympia bodybuilding contest and the rivalry between Arnold Schwarzenegger and Lou Ferrigno.

title: House
description: A schoolgirl travels with six classmates to her ailing aunt's country home, where they come face to face with evil spirits, a demonic house cat, a bloodthirsty piano, and other ghoulish visions.

title: Equus
description: A psychiatrist attempts to uncover the deep-rooted personal and religious issues that led a stable boy to blind six horses.

title: A Special Day
description: On the day of Hitler's visit to Rome in 1938, a persecuted journalist and a sentimental housewife form a close friendship.

title: The Last Wave
description: An Australian lawyer defends a group of Aboriginal men accused of murder, and in the process discovers that he shares a strange mystical connection to them and their culture.

title: Martin
description: A young man, who believes himself to be a vampire, goes to live with his elderly and hostile cousin in a small Pennsylvania town where he tries to redeem his blood-craving urges.

title: Rabid
description: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after undergoing experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into rabid, blood-thirsty zombies who proceed to infect others.

title: Rolling Thunder
description: Major Charles Rane comes home from the war and is given a number of gifts from his hometown because he is a war hero. A group of greedy thugs decides to steal the silver dollars and kill his family.

title: Black Sunday
description: An Israeli anti-terrorist agent must stop a disgruntled Vietnam veteran cooperating with a terrorist group to blow up the Super Bowl blimp.

title: Capricorn One
description: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret.

title: The Late Show
description: An aging private investigator gets entangled with a quirky woman while trying to solve the murder of his former partner.

title: Jabberwocky
description: A young peasant with no interest in adventure or fortune is mistaken for the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

title: Man of Marble
description: A young filmmaker creates a documentary about a once-celebrated bricklayer who became a hero of the state, but whose life and reputation were later destroyed.

title: Padre Padrone
description: The true story of a young Sardinian boy who is pulled out of school by his domineering father to work as a shepherd, where he suffers years of isolation and abuse before discovering education and language.

title: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
description: A dedicated schoolteacher leads a double life: by night she cruises singles bars, looking for casual sex and dangerous encounters.

title: Oh, God!
description: God appears to an assistant grocery manager as a good-natured old man with a message for the world.

title: The Kentucky Fried Movie
description: A series of loosely connected skits that spoof news programs, commercials, soft-core porn, kung-fu movies, and disaster films.

title: New York, New York
description: An egotistical saxophone player and a young singer meet on V-J Day and embark upon a rocky and passionate relationship.

title: Desperate Living
description: A neurotic housewife murders her husband with the help of her overweight maid and they go on the run to Mortville, a refuge for criminals run by the evil Queen Carlotta.

title: The Serpent's Egg
description: An unemployed Jewish circus performer in 1923 Berlin uncovers a sinister series of experiments being conducted on humans.

title: Demon Seed
description: A scientist creates Proteus IV, a super computer with a mind of its own that becomes obsessed with his wife.

title: Citizens Band
description: Several characters in a small town, united by their use of CB radio, interact with one another in various comic and dramatic ways.

title: Providence
description: An aging writer spends a sleepless night painfully crafting a final novel, mixing fantasy with his real-life family relationships.

title: Iphigenia
description: Agamemnon must sacrifice his daughter Iphigenia to the gods in order to secure favorable winds for his ships to sail to Troy.
